entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
